title: Submitting User Query
narrative: Your input is being securely packaged and transmitted into UltraAI’s orchestration pipeline.

title: LLMs Working
narrative: Multiple models are now analyzing your query in parallel, each generating unique perspectives.

title: Receiving Initial Responses
narrative: Initial outputs are flowing back from the models. UltraAI is validating and capturing the first wave of results.

title: Assigning Meta-Edits
narrative: UltraAI is assigning meta-agents to review, critique, and refine each response for clarity and accuracy.

title: Receiving Meta Responses
narrative: Meta-agents have returned their edits. UltraAI is aligning refined perspectives into a shared framework.

title: Compiling UltraAI Output
narrative: All validated responses and meta-edits are merging. UltraAI is synthesizing them into a single polished product.

title: Ultra Synthesis™ Complete!
narrative: Your UltraAI-compiled result is complete. You may now review the final output, explore earlier model iterations, and export in your preferred format.
